content:
Yes, you will find plenty of coffee shops in Seattle that serve delicious pastries and desserts, either baked in-house or sourced from local bakeries. Here are some popular coffee shops that are known for their baked goods:

- Bakery Nouveau: This patisserie is in West Seattle, and is famous for its decadent French pastries, chocolate croissants and flaky croissants.

- Macrina Bakery and Cafe: This is an artisan bakery that is known for its fresh bread, tarts, cakes and pies.

- Columbia City Bakery: This is another local bakery that supplies their pastry goods to many coffee shops in Seattle. They create croissants, pastries, tarts and breads that pair well with coffee.

- Fuji Bakery: This Japanese-inspired bakery creates artistic pastries, including light and airy cream puffs, green tea shortbread and savory sandwich buns.

- Top Pot Doughnuts: This doughnut shop has several locations throughout Seattle and offers more than 40 types of hand-forged doughnuts.

These are just a few examples of the excellent bakeries and pastry shops you can find in Seattle!
